system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining @Affliction[confused] 5. Upon resolving this attack, the user freely uses Psychic Terrain.

Requirement: [Psychic] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Psychic-Type attack on the user's Active List.
